alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 28 at 6:02PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of north central Juab and southeastern Tooele Counties through 645 PM MDT... At 602 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles southeast of Wendover to 24 miles west of Nephi. Movement was northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Grantsville, Dugway English Village, Vernon, Ophir, Dugway Proving Ground Test Range, Tooele Army Depot South, Skull Valley, Tooele Army Depot, Stockton, Rush Valley and Faust. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Tooele and Rush Valleys; Western Millard and Juab Counties
